channel.title: [NEW] [508] Alpha Pkz
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://speedcap.net/img/04ec1a16cbecb07aae7d8e17dac95dc7/ab3a0973.png[/img]
Website: [URL=http://"http://alphapkz.weebly.com/"]Alpha Pkz[/URL] Webclient: [URL=http://"http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Alpha-Pkz317"]Alpha Pkz | Play here[/URL][/CENTER]
[B]Alpha-Pkz features:[/B]
[ul][li]100% uptime[/li] [li]Working bosses[/li] [li]Custom bosses[/li] [li]Great drop rates[/li] [li]All nex sets (Torva, Pernix, Virtus)[/li] [li]All dung sets (Primal, Celestial, Sagittarian)[/li] [li]Great pking[/li] [li]Flawless gear switching[/li] [li]No lag[/li] [li]Soulsplit and Turmoil work perfectly[/li] [li]Great donator benefits[/li] [li]Working minigames[/li] [li]Great staff[/li] [li]Working skillcapes[/li] [li]Working godwars[/li] [li]Kill/Death ratio[/li] [li]A lot more! Check it out for yourself![/li][/ul]
[b][size=10pt]Future Updates[/size][/b]
[ul][li] Each skill has it's own shop[/li] [li] More items in the Donator Zone[/li][/ul]
[b][size=10pt]Recent Updates[/size][b]
[ul][li]Minor bugs fixed[/li] [li]Donator Shops removed/added some items[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/5242034_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/899095_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/2156791_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/1035136_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/9193132_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://alphapkz.weebly.com/uploads/1/2/6/3/12638804/1573639_orig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://speedcap.net/img/04ec1a16cbecb07aae7d8e17dac95dc7/6aa403c6.png[/img] [IMG]http://speedcap.net/img/04ec1a16cbecb07aae7d8e17dac95dc7/04f7da96.png[/img] [IMG]http://speedcap.net/img/04ec1a16cbecb07aae7d8e17dac95dc7/6f5bf545.png[/img] [IMG]http://speedcap.net/img/04ec1a16cbecb07aae7d8e17dac95dc7/a1da8dcf.png[/img]
[center][size=12pt][B]What's so good about Alpha Pkz?[/B][/size][/center]
The staff is very friendly, and they take every suggestion that each player has, and they take it into consideration. Even though we have little players at the moment since this is a new server, you should join early because then you can get to know people, and also get to test out everything early! The server goes through frequent updates, and staff will work on bugs/glitches as soon as somebody spots them out. As soon as you log in, it tells you what the most recent update is so you can stay up to date on what is going on around.
We do drop parties every time we reach a milestone, so you can get your sneaky little hands on some rare items every now and then. Alpha Pkz is still in development, the owner is currently in progress for creating a forum, which he can then put his own webclient on. He will also be creating a client so that you download it and play. There is still a lot in development, so stay patient when you see things that aren't going well, or some things that aren't currently in the game.
[CENTER][B][size=12pt]Staff[/size][/B] Main Owner: Zak69 Co-Owner: Madmutt13 Developer: Hannah
Head Admin: Moe Administrator: Patrick
Head Moderator: - Moderator: Darkmage7721 Moderator: - Moderator: -
Moderator positions are [OPEN][/CENTER]
[shadow=green,left]If anybody asks, Jonny sent you. ;) I will update this thread as updates occur through the server.[/shadow]

Alpha-Pkz features:

[center][size=12pt]What’s so good about Alpha Pkz?[/size][/center]

The staff is very friendly, and they take every suggestion that each player has, and they take it into consideration. Even though we have little players at the moment since this is a new server, you should join early because then you can get to know people, and also get to test out everything early! The server goes through frequent updates, and staff will work on bugs/glitches as soon as somebody spots them out. As soon as you log in, it tells you what the most recent update is so you can stay up to date on what is going on around.

We do drop parties every time we reach a milestone, so you can get your sneaky little hands on some rare items every now and then.
Alpha Pkz is still in development, the owner is currently in progress for creating a forum, which he can then put his own webclient on. He will also be creating a client so that you download it and play. There is still a lot in development, so stay patient when you see things that aren’t going well, or some things that aren’t currently in the game.
